fw.name: BasicTopologicalOpe
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATComputePointOnWire
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that computes mathematical points on a wire.

method.name: GetMathPoint
method.abstract: Retrieves the corresponding mathematical point.

method.name: GetValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the corresponding value for the computation.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetMathPoint
method.abstract: Defines the mathematical point and it switches the type of computation to valued from mathpoint.

method.name: SetValue
method.abstract: Defines the value for the computation and it switches the type of computation to mathpointform value.

class.name: CATLengthFromBodyOnWire
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that computes the length between two point bodies.

constructor.name: CATLengthFromBodyOnWire
constructor.abstract: Constructs an operator that computes the distance between two vertices along a wire body.

constructor.name: CATLengthFromBodyOnWire
constructor.abstract: Constructs an operator that computes the distance between two vertices along a wire.

constructor.name: CATLengthFromBodyOnWire
constructor.abstract: Constructs an operator that computes the distance between two vertices along a wire body.

constructor.name: CATLengthFromBodyOnWire
constructor.abstract: Constructs an operator that computes the distance between two vertices along a wire.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the computed distance.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator in <tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode.

method.name: SetEdge
method.abstract: Defines a new edge along which the distance is computed.

method.name: SetEdge
method.abstract: Defines a new wire body along which the distance is computed.

method.name: SetVertices
method.abstract: Defines the new vertices between which the distance is computed.

method.name: SetVertices
method.abstract: Defines the new vertices between which the distance is computed.

class.name: CATTopCrvToNurbsCrvOperator
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator that converts the geometry of an edge into a NURBS curve.

method.name: IsExactTransformation
method.abstract: Retrieves whether the created curve has been approximated.

method.name: Set3DOutputDimension
method.abstract: Defines whether the resulting curve must be defined as a PCurve or not.

method.name: SetMaxArcs
method.abstract: Defines the maximum number of arcs allowed for the NURBS curve.

method.name: SetMaxDegree
method.abstract: Defines the maximum degree for the created NURBS.

method.name: SetRationalAbility
method.abstract: Defines whether the resulting curve is rational.

method.name: SetSurface
method.abstract: Defines the underlying surface on which the PCurves must be computed.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the fitting tolerance.

class.name: CATTopCurveOperator
class.abstract: Abstract class of the topological operators that creates 1D bodies from geometry.

method.name: GetClosure
method.abstract: Retrieves the closure of the curve.

method.name: GetSupport
method.abstract: Retrieves the support of the curve.

method.name: SetClosure
method.abstract: Sets whether the curve is closed.

method.name: SetSupport
method.abstract: Sets the support of the curve.

class.name: CATTopGeodesicLineOperator
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator that builds a geodesic line on a shell.

class.name: CATTopHelixOperator
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator that builds an helix Body.

method.name: SetProfile
method.abstract: Defines the radius profile of the helix.

method.name: SetTaperAngle
method.abstract: Defines the half angle of the cone on which the helix is laying.

method.name: SetTaperAngleOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the location of the cone apex.

class.name: CATTopLineOperator
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator that builds a line body.

method.name: GetFirstLimit
method.abstract: Reads the first limitation, set for <tt>this</tt> CATTopLineOperator.

method.name: GetSecondLimit
method.abstract: Reads the second limitation, set for <tt>this</tt> CATTopLineOperator.

method.name: SetFirstLimit
method.abstract: Defines the first limitation of the Line Body.

method.name: SetSecondLimit
method.abstract: Defines the second limitation of the Line Body.

class.name: CATTopLineTangentCrvCrvOperator
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator that creates the line bodies tangent to wire bodies.

method.name: GetSupportMode
method.abstract: Returns the type of the created geometry.

method.name: SetSupportMode
method.abstract: Defines the type of the created geometry.

class.name: CATTopLineTangentPtCrvOperator
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator that computes line bodies tangent to a curve body.

method.name: GetSupportMode
method.abstract: Returns the type of the created geometry.

method.name: SetSupportMode
method.abstract: Defines the type of the created geometry.

class.name: CATTopPointOperator
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator that creates a point Body.

class.name: CATTopPolarExtremumOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator which computes the polar extremums of a wire body.

method.name: GetResultAngleMax
method.abstract: Returns the point located at the maximum angle.

method.name: GetResultAngleMin
method.abstract: Returns the point located at the minimum angle.

method.name: GetResultRadiusMax
method.abstract: Returns the point located at the maximum radius.

method.name: GetResultRadiusMin
method.abstract: Returns the point located at the minimum radius.

class.name: CATTopSplineOperator
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator that creates a spline body.

method.name: GetComputedCurvatureVectors
method.abstract: Retrieves, after a Run, the computed curvatures at each point.

method.name: GetComputedTangents
method.abstract: Retrieves, after a Run, the computed tangents at each point.

method.name: GetImposedCurvatureVectors
method.abstract: Retrieves the tangent constraints, as put in the operator definition.

method.name: GetImposedTangents
method.abstract: Retrieves the tangent constraints, as put in the operator definition.

method.name: GetNbPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of points defined at the operator construction.

method.name: GetSplineMode
method.abstract: Returns the spline mode construction.

method.name: SetCurvatureVectors
method.abstract: Sets new curvature contraints.

method.name: SetSplineMode
method.abstract: Sets the type of spline computation.

method.name: SetTangents
method.abstract: Sets new tangent contraints.

class.name: CATTopSurToNurbsSurOperator
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator that converts the geometry of a surface to a NURBS surface.

method.name: IsExactTransformation
method.abstract: Retrieves whether the created surface has been approximated.

method.name: SetMaxArcsU
method.abstract: Defines the maximum number of arcs allowed in U direction for the NURBS surface.

method.name: SetMaxArcsV
method.abstract: Defines the maximum number of arcs allowed in V direction for the NURBS surface.

method.name: SetMaxDegreeU
method.abstract: Defines the maximum degree allowed in U direction for the NURBS surface.

method.name: SetMaxDegreeV
method.abstract: Defines the maximum degree allowed in V direction for the NURBS surface.

method.name: SetRationalAbility
method.abstract: Defines whether the resulting surface is rational.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the fitting tolerance.

function.name: CATCreateComputePointOnWire
function.abstract: Creates an operator that computes mathematical points on a wire.

function.name: CATCreateTopCrvToNurbsCrvOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator to converts the geometry of an edge into a NURBS curve.

function.name: CATCreateTopCrvToNurbsCrvOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator to convert the geometry of an edge into a NURBS curve.

function.name: CATCreateTopGeodesicLineOperatorFromDirection
function.abstract: Creates the CATTopGeodesicLineOperator that will create geodesic line body passing through a point in a given direction.

function.name: CATCreateTopHelix
function.abstract: Creates a helix body.

function.name: CATCreateTopHelixOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator that builds a helix body.

function.name: CATCreateTopInfiniteLineFromDirection
function.abstract: Create an infinite line passing through a point in a given direction.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineAngledTangentToWire
function.abstract: Creates a line body angled to the tangent to the wire at the origin point, and lying in the plane tangent to the shell at the origin point.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineFromDirection
function.abstract: Creates a line body passing through a point with a given direction.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineFromPoints
function.abstract: Creates a line body passing through two points.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineInfiniteOperatorFromDirection
function.abstract: Create an infinite line passing through a point in a given direction.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineNormalToShell
function.abstract: Creates a line body normal to a shell at a point.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineOperatorAngledTangentToWire
function.abstract: Creates a topological line operator that builds a line angled to the tangent to the wire at the origin point, and lying in the plane tangent to the shell at the origin point.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineOperatorFromDirection
function.abstract: Creates a topological line operator that builds a line passing through a point and with a given direction.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineOperatorFromPoints
function.abstract: Creates a topological line operator that builds a line passing through two points.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineOperatorNormalToShell
function.abstract: Creates a topological line operator that builds a line normal to a shell at a point.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineOperatorTangentToWire
function.abstract: Creates a topological line operator that builds a line tangent to a wire at a given point on the wire.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineTangentCrvCrvOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator to compute the line bodies tangent to two coplanar wire bodies.

function.name: CATCreateTopLineTangentToWire
function.abstract: Creates a line body tangent to a wire at a given point on the wire.

function.name: CATCreateTopLnTgtPtCrvOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator to compute line bodies tangent to a curve body.

function.name: CATCreateTopPointOnSurface
function.abstract: Creates a topological point body on a surface at a given distance from another point in a given direction.

function.name: CATCreateTopPointOnWire
function.abstract: Creates a topological point body on a wire at a given distance from another point on the wire.

function.name: CATCreateTopPointOperator
function.abstract: Default constructor of an operator of topological point.

function.name: CATCreateTopPointUV
function.abstract: Creates a topological point body on a surface at a given distance in each surface direction.

function.name: CATCreateTopPointXYZ
function.abstract: Creates a topological point body from three coordinates.

function.name: CATCreateTopPointsTgtOnWire
function.abstract: Creates a body containing the set of points having a given tangent on a wire.

function.name: CATCreateTopPolarExtremumOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator which computes the polar extremums of a wire.

function.name: CATCreateTopSpline
function.abstract: DO NOT USE - Use either of the CATCreateTopStableSpline function.

function.name: CATCreateTopSplineOperator
function.abstract: DO NOT USE - Use either of CATCreateTopStableSpline functions.

function.name: CATCreateTopStableSpline
function.abstract: Creates a spline body.

function.name: CATCreateTopStableSplineOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator that builds a spline body.

function.name: CATCreateTopSurToNurbsSurOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator to convert the geometry of a surface into a NURBS surface.

function.name: CATCreateTopSurToNurbsSurOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator to convert the geometry of a surface into a NURBS surface.
